page.title: 03INDEPENDENT ED.3+:WOKINGHAM
page.content: {White House School}-170 pupils aged from 3 to 11. The building is surrounded by lawns and gardens and there is a heated swimming pool. It has a Christian foundation and a Christian assembly is held daily. The fees vary according to age: Â£206 for under 5's to Â£448 for the upper school (per term). There are optional extras( dancing and piano) a uniform is worn. {Holme Grange School}-200 pupils aged from 4 to 13. The school occupies a large mansion in 21 acres of grounds. It has a heated swimming pool, all weather playground and a sports hall. At the age of 7 the children take a competitive exam to enter the senior part of the school. Boys are prepared for entrance to Public schools; girls for independent schools. Tuition fees are Â£377 for under 7; Â£504 for 7-13's. Extras available include fencing.
